name: plugin-quickstart
description: Includes all of hinos plugins for quick build and fixbug

scripts.clone: npm run clone:hinos && npm run clone:log && npm run clone:route && npm run clone:validation && npm run clone:serve && npm run clone:bodyparser && npm run clone:requestmatcher && npm run clone:mongo && npm run clone:socketio && npm run clone:redis && npm run clone:rabbitmq && npm run clone:cors && npm run clone:common && npm run clone:requesthasher
scripts.install: npm install -g rimraf && npm run install:hinos && npm run install:log && npm run install:route && npm run install:validation && npm run install:serve && npm run install:bodyparser && npm run install:requestmatcher && npm run install:mongo && npm run install:socketio && npm run install:redis && npm run install:rabbitmq && npm run install:cors && npm run install:common && npm run install:requesthasher
scripts.build: npm run build:hinos && npm run build:log && npm run build:route && npm run build:validation && npm run build:serve && npm run build:bodyparser && npm run build:requestmatcher && npm run build:mongo && npm run build:socketio && npm run build:redis && npm run build:rabbitmq && npm run build:cors && npm run build:common && npm run build:requesthasher
scripts.pull: npm run pull:hinos && npm run pull:log && npm run pull:route && npm run pull:validation && npm run pull:serve && npm run pull:bodyparser && npm run pull:requestmatcher && npm run pull:mongo && npm run pull:socketio && npm run pull:redis && npm run pull:rabbitmq && npm run pull:cors && npm run pull:common && npm run pull:requesthasher
scripts.update: npm run update:hinos && npm run update:log && npm run update:route && npm run update:validation && npm run update:serve && npm run update:bodyparser && npm run update:requestmatcher && npm run update:mongo && npm run update:socketio && npm run update:redis && npm run update:rabbitmq && npm run update:cors && npm run update:common && npm run update:requesthasher
scripts.commit: npm run commit:hinos && npm run commit:log && npm run commit:route && npm run commit:validation && npm run commit:serve && npm run commit:bodyparser && npm run commit:requestmatcher && npm run commit:mongo && npm run commit:socketio && npm run commit:redis && npm run commit:rabbitmq && npm run commit:cors && npm run commit:common && npm run commit:requesthasher
scripts.publish: npm run publish:hinos && npm run publish:log && npm run publish:route && npm run publish:validation && npm run publish:serve && npm run publish:bodyparser && npm run publish:requestmatcher && npm run publish:mongo && npm run publish:socketio && npm run publish:redis && npm run publish:rabbitmq && npm run publish:cors && npm run publish:common && npm run publish:requesthasher
scripts.commit:hinos: cd hinos && git add . && git pull && git commit -m "Update lastest libs" && git push
scripts.commit:log: cd hinos-log && git add . && git pull && git commit -m "Update lastest libs" && git push
scripts.commit:route: cd hinos-route && git add . && git pull && git commit -m "Update lastest libs" && git push
scripts.commit:validation: cd hinos-validation && git add . && git pull && git commit -m "Update lastest libs" && git push
scripts.commit:serve: cd hinos-serve && git add . && git pull && git commit -m "Update lastest libs" && git push
scripts.commit:bodyparser: cd hinos-bodyparser && git add . && git pull && git commit -m "Update lastest libs" && git push
scripts.commit:requestmatcher: cd hinos-requestmatcher && git add . && git pull && git commit -m "Update lastest libs" && git push
scripts.commit:mongo: cd hinos-mongo && git add . && git pull && git commit -m "Update lastest libs" && git push
scripts.commit:socketio: cd hinos-socketio && git add . && git pull && git commit -m "Update lastest libs" && git push
scripts.commit:redis: cd hinos-redis && git add . && git pull && git commit -m "Update lastest libs" && git push
scripts.commit:rabbitmq: cd hinos-rabbitmq && git add . && git pull && git commit -m "Update lastest libs" && git push
scripts.commit:cors: cd hinos-cors && git add . && git pull && git commit -m "Update lastest libs" && git push
scripts.commit:common: cd hinos-common && git add . && git pull && git commit -m "Update lastest libs" && git push
scripts.commit:requesthasher: cd hinos-requesthasher && git add . && git pull && git commit -m "Update lastest libs" && git push
